languages.text: Миссия Экклезиархии, служащая на борту пустотного корабля, провела служения во всех уголках одержимого отсека. Слова многоголосых молитв и священные ритуалы взяли свое: чертовщина, забившаяся по щелям, исчезла без следа. Команда воспряла духом и возблагодарила Бога-Императора за защиту.

The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.
languages.original_text: Миссия Экклезиархии, служащая на борту пустотного корабля, провела служения во всех уголках одержимого отсека. traits.locale_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the void vessel held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew cheered up and praised God-Emperor for protection.

The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.

languages.text: 虚空舰上的国教使团在每个有恶魔出没的船舱的角落布道，高声颂唱着圣歌，举行着神圣仪式。躲藏在裂缝中的恶魔消失得无影无踪，船员们欢呼起来，赞美神皇的保护。
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.

languages.text: La misión de la Eclesiarquía a bordo de la nave del vacío celebró sermones en todos los rincones de la cámara embrujada. Los cantos a muchas voces y los rituales sagrados manifestaron su poder, y los daemons que merodeaban por las grietas desaparecieron sin dejar rastro. La tripulación fue aclamada y alabó al Dios Emperador por su protección.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.

traits.locale_text: La misión de la Eclesiarquía a bordo de la nave del vacío celebró sermones en todos los rincones de la cámara embrujada. Los cantos a muchas voces y los rituales sagrados manifestaron su poder, y los daemons que merodeaban por las grietas desaparecieron sin dejar rastro. La tripulación fue aclamada y alabó al Dios Emperador por su protección.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップに乗船している帝国聖教会の聖務団が、呪われた部屋の隅々まで説教を行った。いくつもの声が重なって聞こえる聖歌と聖なる儀式で、その力をこれでもかと示し、隙間に隠れるディーモンは跡形もなく消える。クルーは歓声を上げて、神帝陛下のご加護を讃えた。
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップに乗船している帝国聖教会の聖務団が、呪われた部屋の隅々まで説教を行った。いくつもの声が重なって聞こえる聖歌と聖なる儀式で、その力をこれでもかと示し、隙間に隠れるディーモンは跡形もなく消える。クルーは歓声を上げて、神帝陛下のご加護を讃えた。

languages.text: Les missionnaires de l'Ecclésiarchie prononcent des admonestations dans chaque recoin de la salle hantée. Les psaumes et rituels sacrés font montre de leur puissance, et les démons tapis dans les fissures disparaissent sans laisser de traces. Soulagé, l'équipage remercie l'Empereur-Dieu pour sa protection.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.

traits.locale_text: Les missionnaires de l'Ecclésiarchie prononcent des admonestations dans chaque recoin de la salle hantée. Soulagé, l'équipage remercie l'Empereur-Dieu pour sa protection.

languages.text: Die Mission der Ekklesiarchie an Bord des Raumschiffs hielt in allen Winkeln der befallenen Kammer Predigten. Die vielstimmigen Gesänge und heiligen Rituale manifestierten ihre Kraft, und die Dämonen, die in den Winkeln und Ritzen lauerten, verschwanden spurlos. Die Stimmung der Crew hellte sich auf und sie priesen den Gottimperator für seinen Schutz.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. traits.locale_text: Die Mission der Ekklesiarchie an Bord des Raumschiffs hielt in allen Winkeln der befallenen Kammer Predigten. Die vielstimmigen Gesänge und heiligen Rituale manifestierten ihre Kraft, und die Dämonen, di ein den Winkeln und Ritzen lauerten, verschwanden spurlos. Die Stimmung der Crew hellte sich auf und sie priesen den Gottimperator für seinen Schutz.

languages.text: Gemideki Ekleşiarşi misyonu, lanetli bölmenin her köşesinde vaazlar verdi. Çok sesli ilahiler ve kutsal ayinler güçlerini gösterdi ve çatlaklarda saklanan iblisler iz bırakmadan kayboldu. Mürettebat neşelendi ve sağladığı koruma için Tanrı İmparator'a şükretti.
languages.original_text: The Ecclesiarchy mission on board the voidship held sermons in every corner of the haunted chamber. The many-voiced chants and holy rituals manifested their power, and the daemons skulking in the cracks vanished without a trace. The crew was cheered and they praised the God-Emperor for His protection.
